put.description: If the property 'templates' is not provided or is provided with a null value, the system consider that the the templates should be changed for this user. If a value is provided, even an empty array, then the system will change the templates for this person i.e. if the template property is an empty array, the system will exclude the templates for this person.

patch.description: If the property 'templates' is not provided or is provided with a null value, the system consider that the the templates should be changed for this user. If a value is provided, even an empty array, then the system will change the templates for this person i.e. if the template property is an empty array, the system will exclude the templates for this person.
